description: This schema provides construct and validation rules for AWS-XRay Group resource parameters.

FilterExpression.description: The filter expression defining criteria by which to group traces.
FilterExpression.markdownDescription:
The filter expression defining criteria by which to group traces.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

GroupName.description: The case-sensitive name of the new group. Names must be unique.
GroupName.markdownDescription:
The case-sensitive name of the new group. Names must be unique.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 32   

Update requires: No interruption

GroupARN.description: The ARN of the group that was generated on creation.
GroupARN.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the group that was generated on creation.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 400   

Update requires: No interruption

InsightsConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

InsightsEnabled.description: Set the InsightsEnabled value to true to enable insights or false to disable insights.

NotificationsEnabled.description: Set the NotificationsEnabled value to true to enable insights notifications. Notifications can only be enabled on a group with InsightsEnabled set to true.
